EmailTemplate.name: 202012_CH_Americas_MSP_Universal_Emails.202011_Americas_Email1_MSP_DR
EmailTemplate.subject: Our MSP Avionics coverage takes flight with our partnership with Universal Avionics
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear Customer, We are pleased to announce our partnership with Universal Avionics, a collaboration that enables us to expand the range of product coverage and deliver a comprehensive range of services to you – our Maintenance Service Plan (MSP) – Avionics customer. If your aircraft is equipped with EFI-890, FMS, MFD-640, Unilink, TAWS, or other Universal Avionics components, we encourage you to reach out to us to learn more about this MSP Third-Party program. There are multiple platforms eligible for this coverage including Dassault, Gulfstream, Cessna and Bombardier models. To make things easy, you can join the program and be invoiced through your existing MSP – Avionics contract. We greatly value the opportunity to discuss this program with you in more detail. Send us an email <[[mailto:MSPAvionicsSales@Honeywell.com?subject=Learn%20more%20about%20Third%20Party%20Universal%20Program]]> and we are more than happy to provide you additional information tailored to your aircraft’s equipment onboard. Let’s connect. Stay safe, The Honeywell MSP – Avionics team Equipment Overview <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell_UA-MSPAv-Equipment-Overview.pdf]]>
